text:
Shutter (Thai: ชัตเตอร์ กดติดวิญญาณ) is a 2004 Thai horror film by Banjong Pisanthanakun and Parkpoom Wongpoom; starring Ananda Everingham, Natthaweeranuch Thongmee, and Achita Sikamana. It focuses on mysterious images seen in developed pictures. The film was a huge box office success making it one  of the best horror movies of Thailand recognized worldwide. 
An English-language remake under the same title was released in 2008.The film was also remade in Hindi as Click.
